metadata.title: DEVLOG Entry Template
metadata.purpose: Template for adding new entries to DEVLOG

instructions.usage: Use this template when adding new entries to DEVLOG.md. Copy the structure below and insert it at the INSERT_NEW_ENTRIES_HERE marker.

entry.title: [DESCRIPTIVE TITLE IN CAPS]
entry.problem: [Clear description of the issue or feature being addressed]
entry.root-cause: [Technical explanation of why this occurred, if applicable]

entry.title: SAVE BUTTON VALIDATION FIX
entry.problem: Save button permanently disabled preventing trip creation
entry.root-cause: TripDetailsEditForm.tsx initialized destinations with [''] instead of []

solution.step: Verified form validation logic accepts empty array
Tested Save button enables with complete form data

guidelines.guideline: Be Specific: Include line numbers, exact error messages, and precise descriptions
Be Concise: Keep entries focused and readable
Be Complete: Include all relevant context for future reference
Use Consistent Formatting: Follow the template structure exactly
Include Dates: Always use YYYY-MM-DD format
Reference Issues: Link to related TROUBLESHOOTING.md entries when applicable
Track Status: Mark entries as COMPLETE, IN PROGRESS, or BLOCKED

insertion-process.step: Insert your new entry AFTER the marker
Ensure proper markdown hierarchy (### for dates, #### for titles)
Commit with descriptive message referencing the work done
